hero.headline: Flexible Shifts. Clear Earnings. Faster Payouts.
hero.subheadline: Manage your schedule, swap shifts instantly, and track your daily earnings in real-time. Work on your terms.

benefits.title: Redemption of interest
benefits.description: Redeem your accumulated interest anytime directly to your bank account.

benefits.title: Working capital
benefits.description: Unlock flexible working capital limits based on your revenue.

benefits.title: All virtual payments
benefits.description: Issue unlimited virtual cards for all your vendor payments.

features.title: Smart Scheduling
features.description: View your schedule weeks in advance. Request time off or swap shifts with coworkers directly from the app.

features.title: Transparent Earnings
features.description: Never wonder how much you made. See your hourly wages and tips updated immediately after every shift.

features.title: Instant Payouts
features.description: Need cash now? Access a portion of your earned wages before payday with our instant payout feature.

reviews.author: Mike T.
reviews.text: I love being able to pick up extra shifts whenever I need money. The app makes it so easy to see what's available.

reviews.author: Sarah L.
reviews.text: Instant payouts are a lifesaver. I don't have to wait two weeks to get paid for the work I did today.

cta.title: Join the flexible workforce.
cta.description: Download the Cravings Worker App and take control of your schedule.
